name: Stygian Palace
description:
Survive as long as you can against an endless wave of shadow creatures in a forgotten palace. Shadows can push, grab, and attack your flashlight beam, and can only be killed by a sudden burst of light.

NOTE: Some audio effects seem to be causing issues in Chrome. Try Firefox or a downloadable version.

Made in 3 days for the GDL July 2018 Jam.

All audio is from the Sonniss GDC 2018 audio bundle, and the font used is Alagard by Hewett Tsoi.
